Gogo Hackathon
February 26 - 27, 2013

What's the story?

MonkeyBars has teamed up with Gogo to bring a great new hackathon to Chicago's tech scene! We'll push more details as they become available, so keep an eye on this and our Facebook event page. In the meantime, find more ways to get involved!

Join us for a chance to improve Gogos product offerings and express your unique creativity. Most importantly, come network with Chicago's tech gurus while working on products used by thousands.

General Challenge

Generate a product or idea that helps air travelers stay connected to the things they care about most - loved ones, entertainment, or work. Review Gogo's API: http://gogohack-masstroy.rhcloud.com/

HOWEVER, you are not limited to the above. Thinking outside the box is greatly rewarded.

    Saturday - February 22nd

  • 11:00am- Doors open
  • 11:30am- Lunch from Yindee & Opening Remarks
  • 12:00pm- Building Starts!
  • 7:00pm- Dinner from Beezzee
  • 11:00pm- Late Night Snack from Black Dog Gelato

    Sunday - February 23rd

  • 7:00am- Breakfast from Glazed and Infused
  • 11:00am- Lunch from Lou Malnati's
  • 12:00pm- Building Stops!
  • 12:15pm- Project Presentations
  • 1:00pm- Prizes!
  • 2:00pm- Leave for sleep

Prizes

1st Place

  • The whole team will receive...
  • Cube Personal 3D Printer

Winning Team:

Team Mindmappers
- mind-mapped Wikipedia to create a more intuitive learning tool

2nd Place

  • Each team member will receive...
  • 1 Chromebook

Winning Team:

Team Rubix Virtual
- created an interface to control a virtual Rubik's Cube with a Leap Motion

3rd Runner Up

  • Each team member will receive...
  • 1 Pebble Watch

Winning Team:

Team Vidgeo
- created an app that merges geo-location and video creation
